title: Kayle: Any Planned New Skin?
body: Or is Kayle one of the forgotten champions?

replies.body:
We generally don't discuss what we have/don't have in development 'cause things change internally. For example, if I said there was a new Sona skin in the works, you may be super excited, but if we move it 3-4 months out, it's not going to be the best feeling in the world. In addition, we occasionally scrap ideas, or come back to them later, which would also mean delaying a skin for x champion.

I'd love to hear ideas, though!

Like all champs they cannot say if there is a skin in the works or not. We just have to wait and see.  Her last skin was in 2014, so it's only been 2 years, while many other champs haven't had one in 4 years.

If you haven't had a skin in a year, I think it's acceptable for the champ to get a new skin. There are some champs that have skins only 6 months apart or even less, like Gnar. Other champs, like new champions, tend to get skins before other champions because Riot doesn't want them to have only one skin for too long.

I don't think they will as there are far more influential(popular)  champions in league. Imo there are many easy skins applicable for a champion like Kayle and it is a shame that the kit of one of Leagues' face champions (she is the main focus of the tribunal)  has not been exploited to the max by Riot.

Will Riot Kayle ever be available for purchase again? I thought for sure it would've been available before worlds last year like it was around the August before but it never was. I would trade Aether Wing for Riot Kayle any day of the week. Or buy it for the same price..Rito pls.
I hope they have a new kayle skin soon or at least let people purchase riot kayle sometime soon. I would like to see a tennis kayle for the summer olympics
